name: NO_COLUMN
desc: There is no column in table

name: NOT_FK
desc: Chosen column is not a foreign key

name: REQUIRED_WORD
desc: An important part of the query is missing

name: AS
desc: There are no quotes between a space separated alias
sugg: Add quotes to the part of query

name: WHERE
desc: There is an aggregate function in WHERE

name: INCORRECT_TYPE
desc: Missmatching data types in the query

name: CSV_INCORRECT
desc: Incorrect structure of csv file for table
sugg: Choose another csv file or table
